english.segment1: She couldn't take one more day. Home was more her prison now. Independence called out. She had to get it
english.segment2: A fight was all she needed. To give her reason. She slammed the door with no goodbye. And knew that it was time
english.segment3: Now she's driving to fast. She didn't care to glance behind. And through her tears she laughed. It's time to kiss the past goodbye
english.segment4: I'm finally on my own. Don't try to tell me no. There's so much more for me. Just watch what I will be
english.segment5: Chorus. She walked away. Couldn't say why she was leaving. She walked away. She left all she had believed in. she walked away
english.segment6: Not a day goes by. For the ones she's left behind. They're always asking "why?". And thoughts of her consume her mind
english.segment7: God please let her know. The love we tried to show. We'd promise anything. If you'd just bring her home
english.segment9: Bridge. Tell her we love her. Tell her she's wanted. And one more thing God. Tell her please, come home. Please, come home
english.segment11: The choice is yours alone now. Tell me how this story..ends
